Keycard: Air Circulator [B01]
An old blue keycard. <#FFFF00>Air Circulator Access</color> is printed on the front.
Keycard: Personal Room
The keycard to my very own room in the camp's <#FFFF00>Residential</color> area.
Keycard: Power Relay [B01]
An old yellow keycard. <#FFFF00>Power Relay Access</color> is printed on the front.
Keycard: Power Relay [B02]
Looks like an old entry card. <#FFFF00>Power Relay Access</color> is printed on the front.
Keycard: Alp's Cellar
A keycard to the basement of <#FFFF00>Alp's Pub</color>. The rats must be nasty if he locked them down there.

A keycard authorized to open the gate blocking the underground train tracks.
Keycard: Operating Room [B04]
A keycard that opens the locked door in the underground <#FFFF00>Operating Room</color>.
Keycard: Counterfeit
One-time use keycard to access the heat sink room at the <#FFFF00>Power Plant</color>.
Keycard: Control Center Lab
Keycard that allows to unlock the door to the <#FFFF00>Control Center Lab</color>.
Keycard: Park Office
A keycard that opens the locked door in the underground <#FFFF00>Park Office Room</color>.
Keycard: TECC Master
A keycard that opens the locked door in the underground <#FFFF00>Control Center Exit</color>.
